items.sentence: I\'ll do whatever I can to help you and Tom.
Were all the members present at the meeting?
What did you eat for breakfast this morning?
Tom got a bottle of water out of the fridge.
Tom got angry with the high school students.
It is impossible for us to cross that river.
It probably would be cheaper somewhere else.
It seemed impossible that Tom would succeed.
Tom is the type of person who always smiles.
I\'m surprised that Tom can\'t speak French.
I don\'t know why Tom does things like that.
I don\'t procrastinate as much as I used to.
Tom\'s phone was confiscated by the teacher.
Tom\'s sister is the prettiest girl in town.
Tom\'s team is the worst team in the league.
Tom said he still had a lot of things to do.
Tom said he understood how you were feeling.
Please let go of my arm. You\'re hurting me.
It\'s Tom\'s dream to live in the mountains.
Are you going to go swimming this afternoon?
